metadata.title: WhoIsMakingMoney.ai - Find Your Next Profitable AI Project
metadata.description: Explore in-depth case studies of today's fastest-growing AI applications. We reverse-engineer their business models—from consumer hits to pro-level tools—giving you the blueprint to build what's next.
metadata.keywords: AI products, AI applications, business model analysis, AI tools, consumer AI, professional AI tools, AI success stories, AI project ideas, AI monetization

openGraph.description: Explore in-depth case studies of today's fastest-growing AI applications. We reverse-engineer their business models—from consumer hits to pro-level tools—giving you the blueprint to build what's next.

twitter.title: Find Your Next Profitable AI Project | WhoIsMakingMoney.ai
twitter.description: Explore in-depth case studies of today's fastest-growing AI applications. We reverse-engineer their business models—from consumer hits to pro-level tools—giving you the blueprint to build what's next.

homePage.heroSubtitle: Stop Guessing. Start Building What Works.
homePage.heroDescription: WhoIsMakingMoney.ai is the definitive database of AI business models. We reverse-engineer successful AI applications—from viral consumer hits to niche B2B SaaS—to provide you with actionable case studies and inspiration for your next profitable build.
homePage.emailCtaTitle: Get the first analysis, delivered straight to your inbox.
homePage.emailTrustText: Join thousands of builders discovering how to make money with AI.
homePage.analysisSectionDescription: Discover the mechanics behind proven AI monetization strategies, whether it's subscriptions, credit-based systems, API monetization, or unique direct-to-consumer offerings.
homePage.comingSoonDescription: We're working on bringing you the best AI project analysis content. Stay tuned!

caseStudies.title: Real Case Studies
caseStudies.description: In-depth analysis of successful AI products with actual revenue data and business models.

insights.title: Actionable Insights
insights.description: Get practical blueprints and strategies you can implement to build your own profitable AI project.

strategies.title: Growth Strategies
strategies.description: Learn proven monetization strategies from subscriptions to API-based revenue models.

Footer.about_description: WhoIsMakingMoney.ai (WIMM) is an independent research platform dedicated to uncovering the business strategies behind the world's most successful AI products. Our mission is to provide developers and entrepreneurs with actionable insights to build the future.
